text:
I've never used an SSD in my life, and I got the opportunity to buy one this month, hopefully it arrives in January. Will Julia open faster now?
With my current HDD, it takes like 30 seconds or even a minute.

elements.text:
I've never used an SSD in my life, and I got the opportunity to buy one this month, hopefully it arrives in January. Will Julia open faster now?
With my current HDD, it takes like 30 seconds or even a minute.

text: You've never used an SSD? Prepare to be amazed. Almost every program will be faster (of course only the ones that read files from disk). It's the single best investment in order to speed up your computer

elements.text: You've never used an SSD? Prepare to be amazed. Almost every program will be faster (of course only the ones that read files from disk). It's the single best investment in order to speed up your computer

text: Thank you Jakob. I used my friend's computer like 5 years ago and he had one, and it was really fast, but I never owned one. I am excited!

elements.text: Thank you Jakob. I used my friend's computer like 5 years ago and he had one, and it was really fast, but I never owned one. I am excited!

text: Once you start using an SSD, it's really hard to use HDD's again

elements.text: Once you start using an SSD, it's really hard to use HDD's again
